examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to take part in a game or activity for fun
words.defineVi: để tham gia vào một trò chơi hoặc hoạt động cho vui

examples: My dad doesn't play golf any more.
He has golf on the brain!
Golf is a leisurely sport played on a large green course with clubs and a small ball.
so I resigned as secretary of the golf club.
Playing golf with clients is one way to mix business with pleasure.
words.defineEn: a game that is mostly played outside where each person uses a special stick to hit a small white ball into a number of holes with the least number of swings
words.defineVi: một trò chơi chủ yếu được chơi ngoài trời trong đó mỗi người sử dụng một cây gậy đặc biệt để đánh một quả bóng nhỏ màu trắng vào một số lỗ với số lần xoay ít nhất

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: On the way to the station she passed a cinema.
They share a love of cinema.
Tell him you saw Helena at the cinema with another guy - that should wipe the smile off his face!
As John and Betty started cuddling up in the cinema, I wished I had just gone home instead of playing gooseberry.
John is just an armchair critic who loves to voice his opinions about movies without ever stepping foot in a cinema.
words.defineEn: a building where films are shown
words.defineVi: tòa nhà chiếu phim

examples: I look at tennis differently from some coaches.
She won the tennis tournament and received a trophy.
We played a game of tennis using a yellow ball.
The tennis player achieved a clean sweep of her matches, winning every set and advancing to the finals.
He likes watching professional tennis matches on TV.
words.defineEn: a sport played with rackets by two or four players, who hit a small ball backwards and forwards over a net on a marked court
words.defineVi: một môn thể thao được chơi bằng vợt bởi hai hoặc bốn người chơi, những người này đánh một quả bóng nhỏ tới lui qua lưới trên sân được đánh dấu

examples: Swimming is second nature to Jane.
I'm taking the kids swimming later.
She's never liked swimming.
Swimming helps to improve our cardiovascular fitness.
She packed her swimming gear in a waterproof bag for the pool.
words.defineEn: the act of moving our bodies through water with the use of our arms and legs, particularly as a sport
words.defineVi: hành động di chuyển cơ thể của chúng ta trong nước bằng cách sử dụng cánh tay và chân của chúng ta, đặc biệt là một môn thể thao

examples: I also enjoy windsurfing, tennis, racquetball, swimming, you name it.
words.defineEn: the activity or sport of sailing on water by standing on a special board with a sail attached to it
words.defineVi: hoạt động hoặc môn thể thao chèo thuyền trên mặt nước bằng cách đứng trên một tấm ván đặc biệt có gắn một cánh buồm

examples: He carries a gym bag with his workout clothes and water bottle.
I always go to the gym before work.
We have a home gym downstairs for exercising and staying fit.
Lisa hits the gym regularly to stay in shape and maintain her physical fitness.
Jennifer had been harboring the hots for her gym instructor, Alex.
words.defineEn: a place with special equipment that people go to exercise or play sports
words.defineVi: một nơi có thiết bị đặc biệt mà mọi người đi tập thể dục hoặc chơi thể thao

examples: Do you play a musical instrument?
The talent for playing musical instruments runs in this family, with several members being skilled musicians.
She found a large, dried calabash and thought it would make a unique musical instrument.
The moment validated DJ setups as musical instruments, and showed its capabilities as a tool for improvisation.
And the first evidence of musical instruments dates to around the same time: two 42,000-year-old flutes unearthed in Germany.
words.defineEn: an object or device used for producing music, such as a violin or a piano
words.defineVi: một đối tượng hoặc thiết bị được sử dụng để sản xuất âm nhạc, chẳng hạn như một cây vĩ cầm hoặc một cây đàn piano

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
She regularly appears on TV.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau

examples: He worked on his computer game all day.
You're going to be a very good computer game writer one day.
As people turned to computer games, consoles and arcades were hit hard.
'I'm going to make computer games, become rich, and help my mum to be well again.'
He needed to change some things in his computer game before the exhibition.
words.defineEn: a game designed to be played on a computer
words.defineVi: một trò chơi được thiết kế để chơi trên máy tính

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: Dancing seemed to come naturally to her.
She only wanted him to go on dancing till he dropped.
-I always loved dancing.
He doesn't like dancing.
What's good dancing music, for dancing?
words.defineEn: ‌the act of moving our body to music; a set of movements performed to music
words.defineVi: ‌hành động di chuyển cơ thể của chúng ta theo âm nhạc; một tập hợp các phong trào thực hiện âm nhạc

examples: Running has never been Tyler's thing.
Stan had the chainsaw running.
The new running shoes have a reinforced toe to provide extra durability and protection.
She put on her running shoes and went for a jog in the park.
If she continues to perform well, she will be in the running for a promotion at work.
words.defineEn: the act of walking in a way that is very fast and both feet are never on the ground at the same time, particularly as a sport
words.defineVi: hành động đi bộ theo cách rất nhanh và cả hai chân không bao giờ chạm đất cùng một lúc, đặc biệt là một môn thể thao

examples: My dad took me fishing, and we caught a big fish.
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The place still feels like a small fishing village.
The lunch invitation was clearly a fishing expedition to obtain information about his private life.
They worried about an FBI fishing expedition.
words.defineEn: the activity of catching a fish with special equipment such as a fishing line and a hook or net
words.defineVi: hoạt động đánh bắt cá bằng các thiết bị đặc biệt như dây câu và lưỡi câu hoặc lưới

examples: The latest skiing accident is a case in point.
They traveled to the mountains to enjoy hiking and skiing.
It's fun to go skiing or snowboarding on the mountains in winter.
When the price of skiing doubled, tourists voted with their feet and just stopped going.
Jane also took up skiing at 57.
words.defineEn: the activity or sport of moving over snow on skis
words.defineVi: hoạt động hoặc môn thể thao di chuyển trên tuyết trên ván trượt

examples: He was talking about cycling across the US or was that just another flight of fancy?
Emily enjoys outdoor activities like hiking and cycling to keep herself in shape.
Cycling is potentially very dangerous in the city - you have to have all your wits about you.
But it still just keeps cycling.
Monthly frequency is called ultra rapid cycling.
words.defineEn: the sport or activity of riding a bicycle
words.defineVi: môn thể thao hoặc hoạt động đi xe đạp

examples: Cooking is just not Emma's thing.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Apparently, Meg's cooking leaves a lot to be desired.
You can leave the cooking to me.
words.defineEn: the act of preparing food by heat or mixing different ingredients
words.defineVi: hành động chuẩn bị thức ăn bằng nhiệt hoặc trộn các thành phần khác nhau

examples: Spring came late this year.
When I saw the old photograph, memories of my childhood home and the sounds of my mother's laughter sprang into my mind.
His new book will be appearing in the spring.
There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, autumn, and winter.
In spring and summer, watch for kingfishers.
words.defineEn: the season that comes after winter, when in most countries the trees and flowers begin to grow again
words.defineVi: mùa đến sau mùa đông, khi ở hầu hết các quốc gia, cây và hoa bắt đầu mọc trở lại

examples: Summer is the season for outdoor concerts and festivals.
My grandmother makes the most amazing damson jam every summer.
I hate summer vacation.
I really love summer evenings.
The college runs summer courses for foreign students.
words.defineEn: the season that comes after spring and in most countries summer is the warmest season
words.defineVi: mùa đến sau mùa xuân và ở hầu hết các quốc gia, mùa hè là mùa ấm nhất

examples: Leaves change colour in autumn.
The leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, autumn, and winter.
August marks the end of summer and the beginning of autumn in some parts of the world.
In September, the weather starts to cool down as autumn approaches.
words.defineEn: the season after summer and before winter when the leaves change color and fall from the trees
words.defineVi: mùa sau mùa hè và trước mùa đông khi lá đổi màu và rụng khỏi cây

examples: Winter brings a peaceful silence, especially after a fresh snowfall.
In many Asian countries, winter melon is a staple ingredient in traditional dishes.
The winter issue is hot off the press.
Winter is the time when people celebrate holidays like Christmas and New Year's.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the season that comes after fall and in most countries winter is the coldest season
words.defineVi: mùa đến sau mùa thu và ở hầu hết các quốc gia, mùa đông là mùa lạnh nhất

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
The season starts in September.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Tomatoes are out of season now.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: a period of time that a year is divided into, such as winter and summer, with each having three months
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian mà một năm được chia thành, chẳng hạn như mùa đông và mùa hè, mỗi người có ba tháng

examples: The agreement followed months of negotiation.
The school semester starts next month.
We have a family gathering every month.
The permit runs for three months.
Each month she holds a meeting with her entire staff.
words.defineEn: each of the twelve named divisions of the year, like January, February, etc.
words.defineVi: mỗi phần trong số mười hai phần được đặt tên của năm, như tháng Giêng, tháng Hai, v.v.
